name: Shadows: Awakening
description: Shadows: Awakening is a unique, isometric single-player RPG with real-time tactical combat. You embark on an epic adventure with challenging gameplay, a gripping storyline and enchanting graphics.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 64Bit Versions Processor: Intel Compatible 2.1 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX460 2GB or compatible Storage: 13 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 64Bit Versions Processor: Intel Core i7 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 13 GB available space
